answer:
ImmunizeBC is for members of the public, not health care professionals. Please contact the health unit in your area directly.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## ImmunizeBC is for members of the public, not health care professionals.

Please contact the health unit in your area directly.
Immunization Nurse
question: Hello, I have a few adult patients requesting the measles vaccine with no record of immunization. Can I order some MMR for pick up from the Health Unit? Thank you kindly,
question_variation_0: can you pick up mmr for vaccine
question_variation_1: can mmr be picked up at health unit
question_variation_2: mmr can i pick up the mmr
